resources.string: Click to assess your current concentration levels.
What time did you wake up this morning?
How many hours did you sleep last night?
How would you rate today\'s sleep quality?
Oops! Please indicate how well you slept.
Oops! Please set a wake-up time.
Oops! Please indicate your hours slept.
How alert are you feeling right now?
Oops! Please specify your level of alertness.
I had a caffeinated drink within the last hour.

Welcome to Circog! This app is part of a scientific study, which focuses on detecting users\' circadian rhythms, i.e. performance variations throughout the day. From time to time, Circog will prompt you to perform a sequence of concentration tasks. If you do not receive a notification within 24hours after installation, please let us know.
Portrait of the researchers that organise the study: Tilman Dingler and Tonja Maschulla
"This study is conducted by Tilman Dingler and Tonja Maschulla at the University of Stuttgart. In case you have questions, please contact us at userstudies@hcilab.org."

"By pressing accept, you allow Circog to anonymously collect app usage data. All data will be securely stored on a server in compliance with European data protection laws (BGBl. I S. 2325). No phone content or sensor data will be collected. Logs will only be uploaded when you are connected to WiFi to prevent any upload cost. Your data will only be used in the context of our research and will never be shared with third parties. You can withdraw from the study at any moment by simply uninstalling the app. Thanks! And have fun with the tasks!
No connection to our servers - are you connected to the Internet?
Optionally, you can enter your email if you are interested in learning about your circadian rhythm. In case we are able to detect your rhythm, we are happy to send you your results.
